```python
import pandas as pd
import numpy as np
import requests
import urllib.parse

# Define the function to manipulate search engine results
def manipulate_search_results(query, domain, num_results=10):
    # Construct the search query URL
    url = "https://www.google.com/search?q=" + query + "&site=" + domain + "&num=" + str(num_results)

    # Get the search results in a Pandas DataFrame
    results = pd.read_html(url)

    # Extract the relevant data from the results
    extracted_data = pd.concat([results[0].iloc[0:num_results].apply(pd.Series) for results in results])

    # Remove duplicate entries
    extracted_data = extracted_data.drop_duplicates()

    # Return the manipulated results
    return extracted_data

# Example usage:

domain = "example.com"
results = manipulate_search_results(query, domain)

# Print the results
print(results)
```
